means: 有用的，有益的，有帮助的

sentence.Network_en: In business a poker face can be very useful.
sentence.Network_cn: 生意场上，不动声色会非常有用。

sentence.Network_en: "For heaven's sake!" Dot expostulated. "They're cheap and they're useful."
sentence.Network_cn: “拜托！”多特反驳道，“它们又便宜又管用。”

sentence.Network_en: HDTV is especially useful if there are a lot of special effects.
sentence.Network_cn: 有很多特效的时候，高清电视就格外有用了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... used a. 用过的；旧的；二手的 useful a. 有用的，有益的 useless a. 无用的.
...，倒是十分恰当。因为它宣称珍道具并非完全“无用”(useless)，可是实际又没办法使，也就算不上“有用”(useful)，于是只好被称作“并非无用”了。
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... used a. 用过的；旧的；二手的 useful a. 有用的，有益的 useless a. 无用的.
但一个总的感觉是，博氏平壤之行的成果，似乎并不像其对媒体所透露的那样“有益”（useful）。请问你如何看这个问题？

jx.jx_en_mean: do something that is of some value or benefit to someone

lj.lj_ly: make yourself useful—get Jenny a drink.
lj.lj_ls: 做点好事——帮珍妮拿杯饮料。

encyclopedia.content: 读音 useful英音：['ju:sfəl]美音：['jusfəl]useful的中文翻译 形容词 a. 1. 有用的；有益的；有帮助的[(+to/for/in)] She gave us some useful information. 她给了我们一些很有用的信息。 2. 【俚】值得高度赞扬的；对。..很熟练的[(+at)] 1. 有用的，有帮助的 英语广播词汇（4） useful adj.有用的，有帮助的 2. 有用[效．益]的．实用的 汽车配件英文速查词典-U - 汽车制造词组短语 be useful for对……有用

entry.tran: 有用的；可用的；有助益的
entry.def: If something is useful, you can use it to do something or to help you in some way.

example.ex: The slow cooker is very useful for people who go out all day...
example.tran: 慢炖锅对于整天都不在家的人来说很有用。

example.ex: Hypnotherapy can be useful in helping you give up smoking...
example.tran: 催眠疗法可能有助于你戒烟。

entry.def: If an object or skill comes in useful, it can help you achieve something in a particular situation.

example.ex: The accommodation is some distance from the clubhouse, so a hire car comes in useful.
example.tran: 住处离会所有一段距离，所以租一辆车会很有用。

means.word_mean: 2. of great importance or use or service;
3. capable of being turned to use or account;

auth_sentence.content: So send your broken down PC to somewhere useful.
auth_sentence.res_content: So send your broken down PC to somewhere useful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So send your broken down PC to somewhere useful.

auth_sentence.content: This technique is particularly useful in treating bladder cancer.
auth_sentence.res_content: This technique is particularly useful in treating bladder cancer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This technique is particularly useful in treating bladder cancer.

auth_sentence.content: It is really useful and a very good idea!
auth_sentence.res_content: It is really useful and a very good idea!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is really useful and a very good idea!

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无用的, 无效的, 无益的, 无价值的
stems_affixes.word_buile: use用+less无→adj.无用的, 无效的, 无益的, 无价值的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有用的, 有益的, 有帮手的
stems_affixes.word_buile: use用+ful表形容词→adj.有用的, 有益的, 有帮手的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使用, 利用, 耗费
stems_affixes.word_buile: use用→n.&v.使用, 利用, 耗费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 打消[某人]的错误念头,纠正
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis去掉+abuse[n.&v.滥用]→去掉滥用→纠正错误

Sentence.sentence: And, perhaps, similar to sails, they make a useful back-up for when the lights go out.
Marking a book is a useful skill, but it's important to do it right.
Useful thinking skills for advanced academic research.
Experts see a movement toward the use of mobile technology in education, though they say it is in its infancy as professors try to come up with useful applications.
They are easily-available on the continent and they are useful if a singer has problems with his vocal cords and has to sing that night.
Few of us wish to turn the clock back, but perhaps we need to remind ourselves how useful the right obstacles can be.

means.word_mean: 有用的, 有益的, 有帮助的

sentences.en: He's a useful person to know.
sentences.cn: 他是个应该结交的有帮助的人。

sentences.en: Information about people's language ability is often very useful.
sentences.cn: 有关人们语言能力的信息经常是很有用的。

sentences.en: The computer is useful in processing data.
sentences.cn: 电子计算机在处理资料方面很有用。

sentences.en: It is very useful for a person to know how to swim.
sentences.cn: 对一个人来说会游泳是很有用的。

sentences.en: The England cricket team scored quite a useful total.
sentences.cn: 英格兰板球队得分总数令人满意。

jushi.english: She's a useful person to know.
jushi.chinese: 她是个应该结交的有用的人。

jushi.english: The England cricket team scored quite a useful total.
jushi.chinese: 英格兰板球队得分总数令人满意。
